## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## read data

```{r}
pictures=read_excel("../workshop-stats/PictureMemory.xls")
pictures
```

tidy

```{r}
pics = pictures %>% gather(music, correct, everything())
pics
```


boxplots

```{r}
ggplot(pics,aes(x=music, y=correct))+geom_boxplot()
```
